English: I woke up early this morning.

Spanish: Mi vuelo sale a las 7 pm.

English: We usually go to bed at 11 pm.
Spanish: Normalmente nos acostamos a las 11 pm.

English: Can you tell me what time we meet tomorrow?
Spanish: ¿Puedes decirme a qué hora nos encontraremos mañana?

English: This clock is broken and doesn't show the correct time.
Spanish: Este reloj está roto y no muestra la hora correcta.
